work.name: Robin Cook
highlights: Implementing data processes, including extraction, cleaning, and manipulation using Python and SQL
Conducting comprehensive data analysis on large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies, providing insights for strategic decision-making
Creating interactive data visualization through PowerBI and Metabase to effectively communicate findings to non-technical stakeholders
Perform statistical analysis and hypothesis testing to validate assumptions and evaluate A/B marketing experiments
Developed a Flask-based API that generates dynamic maps visualizing delivery areas and error-prone regions, aiding customer success team
Developed a Python script to automate data extraction and processing of Google Search results through Google Ads API

work.name: Mechanics and Renewable Energies Lab
highlights: Contributed to research on water desalination systems using solar energy
Compared different mass concentrations of ZnO nanofluids and investigated the effect of using wood coated with ZnO on the evaporation rate
Attained a 38% enhancement in evaporation efficiency for ZnO-wood and a noteworthy 22% improvement for ZnO nanofluid (0.004%wt.) compared to water

work.name: Ferdowsi University of Mashhad
highlights: Assisted in teaching various numerical analysis concepts
Utilized MATLAB to demonstrate different numerical methods
Assessed and graded theoretical and programming assignments
